text:
Paul Jones Fannin (January 29, 1907January 13, 2002) was an American businessman and politician. He was a Republican. He was a U.S. Senator from Arizona from 1965 to 1977. He was the 11th Governor of Arizona from 1959 to 1965.
Fannin died of a stroke in Phoenix, Arizona on January 13, 2002 at the age of 94.
